title: TO_ARRAY | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Conversion functions , Semi-structured and structured data functions (Array/Object)
Converts the input expression to an ARRAY:

If the input is an ARRAY, or VARIANT containing an array value, the
result is unchanged.
For NULL or a JSON null input, returns NULL.

For any other value, the result is a single-element array containing this
value.
An expression of any data type.

To create an array containing more than one value, you can use
ARRAY_CONSTRUCT.
This example shows how to use TO_ARRAY():
